name: Initial Consultation
description: Comprehensive initial consultation to understand your needs and develop a customized solution plan. Includes detailed assessment, recommendations, and follow-up action items.

name: Follow-up Session
description: Progress review and strategy adjustment session. Evaluate current status, address any concerns, and make necessary modifications to your plan for optimal results.

name: Expert Advisory
description: In-depth expert advisory session for complex challenges. Comprehensive analysis, strategic planning, and implementation guidance with detailed documentation and resources.
